Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute near 51st/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 51 51st  buses temp. rerouted EB: 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells, 51st, Wentworth, 47th; WB: 47th, Halsted, 51st: due to street blockage near 51st/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/Wentworth, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells, 51st, Wentworth, and 47th.

Westbound buses will operate via 47th, Halsted, and 51st.

Allow extra travel time.
